Name: Total time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants where both occur
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the interval starting with First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending with Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Time elapsed from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in completed submission paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to First Look-Your updates are overdue, highlighting delays in author response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Total resolution time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation when followed by Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Manuscript Export Succeeded in variants leading to RW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average waiting time to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation after First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in revision-to-acceptance pathways
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and First Look-Your updates are due in one week, measuring editorial follow-up cadence
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week'

Name: Total time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to final Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted manuscript variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to be followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch in efficient processing paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average cycle time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation when occurring after a major revision decision (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Time elapsed between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in variants where co-author actions occur post-first look
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'
